para.b: One of the main classes of the library.

summary.para: This engine is responsable to Read/Write the records One by One from/to files or streams.

remarks.para: You can set the of this class when found an error, and can retrive them with the property.
See in the Class Diagram and in the Quick Start Guide for more Info.
Or you can browse the Examples Seccion for more code.

FileHelperAsyncEngineCtr.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileHelperEngine class with the specified type of records.

FileHelperAsyncEngineCtrG.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileHelperEngine class with the specified type of records.

LastRecord.summary: Contains the last Record read by the method.

BeginReadFile.summary: Open a specified file and seek to the first record.

remarks.para: This method only open the file.
To read record by record use method.
When you stop to read the file you must call method.

BeginReadFile.param: The file path to be read.
BeginReadFile.returns: True if the file is succefully opened. False otherway.

BeginReadStream.summary: Open a specified stream and seek to the first record.

remarks.para: This method only seek to the first record.
To read record by record use method.
When you stop to read the file you must call method.

ReadNext.summary: Reads the next record of a file opened with the or method.

remarks.para: This method not only returns the current record, also moves to the next.
If the end of file is reached this method return null.

ReadNext.returns: The current record of the opened file.

ReadNexts.summary: Reads the specified number of records from a file or stream opened with the or method.
ReadNexts.remarks: If there are less records in the source, read to the end.
ReadNexts.param: The number of records to read. If there are less records in the source, read to the end.
ReadNexts.returns: The nexts records of the opened file or stream.

Close.summary: Close all opened stream readers and writters (if any).

remarks.para: This method must be called when you finish to process a file to dispose the opened streams.

BeginAppendToFile.summary: Open a file to Append to the end.

remarks.para: This method open and seek ends the file.
When you finish to append to the file you must call method.

BeginAppendToFile.param: The file path to be opened to write at the end.

BeginWriteFile.summary: Open a file to write it. If exist the engine override it

remarks.para: When you finish to write to the file you must call method.

BeginWriteFile.param: The file path to be opened to write.

BeginWriteStream.summary: Set the stream to be used in the operation.

remarks.para: When you finish to write to the file you must call method.

WriteNext.summary: Write the next record to a file or stream opened with , or method.

WriteNexts.summary: Write the nexts records to a file or stream opened with , or method.
WriteNexts.param: The records to write (Can be an array, ArrayList, etc)
